title: Researchers create programmable, autonomous robots smaller than a grain of rice
description:
Powered by light, the robots carry computers and can move in complex patterns, say Penn Engineering and University of Michigan researchers.

The post Researchers create programmable, autonomous robots smaller than a grain of rice appeared first on The Robot Report.
